1.name: Attack (All Troops)
1.text: Increases attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Defense (All Troops)
2.text: Increases defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

3.name: Attack (All Troops)
3.text: Increases attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

4.name: Defense (All Troops)
4.text: Increases defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

5.name: Signal Flare
5.text: Increases damage dealt to watchtowers by ${1}%

6.name: Marionette
6.text: Reduces damage taken from watchtowers by ${1}%

7.name: Moment of Triumph
7.text: While the army led by this commander is at more than 90% strength, increases all damage dealt by ${1}%

9.name: Health (All Troops)
9.text: Increases health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

11.name: Health (All Troops)
11.text: Increases health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

12.name: Attack (All Troops)
12.text: Increases attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

13.name: Thoroughbreds
13.text: When this commander launches a rally attack, increases march speed of the rallied army by ${1}%

14.name: Defense (All Troops)
14.text: Increases defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

15.name: Meteor Shower
15.text: When attacking garrisons, normal attacks have a 10% chance to increase all damage dealt on the next turn by ${1}%

16.name: March Speed (All Troops)
16.text: Increases march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

17.name: Tear of Blessing
17.text: The number of troops that die when attacking another governor's city is reduced by ${1}%, and are instead severely wounded (and can be healed in the Hospital)

18.name: Entrenched
18.text: Increases all damage dealt to strongholds by ${1}%, and damage taken from stronghold garrisons is reduced by ${1}%
